titlestmt.subtitle: Chancellor of the Virginia Community College System, Correspondence and subject files 31048, 31216, 43207, 43865, 44420, 45267, 50877, 51054, 51212, 51525

titlepage.titleproper: A Guide to the Correspondence and subject files of the Chancellor of the Virginia Community College System, 1964-2012
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
the Library of Virginia 31048, 31216, 43207, 43865, 44420, 45267, 50877, 51054, 51212, 51525

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Correspondence and subject files of the Chancellor of the Virginia Community College System, 1964-2012

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Privacy protected and other protected information is considered confidential and is restricted from public access for 75 years. These files are open for access, but files may contain confidential education records or other protected information that must be restricted (see Code of Virginia 2.2-3705.4 and 2.2-3801). It will be necessary for an archivist to review unprocessed material for confidential education or other information for removal or redaction before files can be used by patrons for research purposes or before any copies of records can be made for patrons.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Correspondence and subject files of the Chancellor of the Virginia Community College System, [cite specific date and accession used]. State government records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Virginia Community College System Offices, Chancellor's Office, 101 N. 14th Street, Richmond, VA 23219. Accession 31048 transferred 16 December 1980. Accession 31216 transferred 16 July 1981. Accession 43207 transferred 8 May 2007. Accession 43865 transferred 7 July 2008. Accession 44420 transferred 29 July 2009. Accession 45267 transferred 19 November 2010. Accession 50877 transferred 22 April 2013. Accession 51054 transferred 27 September 2013. Accession 51212 transferred 21 February 2014. Accession 51525 transferred 8 April 2015.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection has been processed using minimal processing standards: the original arrangement has been maintained, the container list is brief and simple, and the records have not been refoldered and fasteners have not been removed.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: These records consist of the correspondence and subject files of the Chancellor of the Virginia Community College System. These records document academic, personnel, fiscal and administrative activities, policies and procedures. Includes correspondence with community colleges and their presidents, as well as state and federal agencies; topical files; and committee meeting records and minutes.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged into the following series:

list.item: Series I: Correspondence and subject files, 1973-1978 [Accession 31048]
Series II: Correspondence and subject files, [Accession 31216]

Series VIII: Correspondence and subject files, [Accession 51054]
Series IX: Correspondence and subject files, [Accession 51212]
Series X: Correspondence and subject files, [Accession 51525]
